shows.title: Family Twist
shows.desc:
The perfect family show where you (parents and children) become the show. Come along and do a poem, song, dance or sketch, play a tune or juggle with toilet rolls... Compered as ever by the incomparable Paul Cookson.

Paul Cookson is one of the busiest and best-loved poets around, working at festivals and schools all over the world.

shows.title: The Very Best of Paul Cookson
shows.desc:
Like pantomime – but with better rhymes, Paul will be performing work from his best-selling poetry collections The Very Best Of and Joke Shop as well as previewing new material from forthcoming books. Expect fun, thoughtfulness, laughter and audience participation.

Paul Cookson is one of the busiest and best-loved poets around, working at festivals and schools all over the world.
